sentences.english: Many people com tributed for the flood victims.
sentences.chinese: 许多人向水灾灾民捐款。

sentences.english: Indah has the highest number of flood victims.
sentences.chinese: 运达的水灾灾民的人数最多。

sentences.english: I heard that a mass campaign encouraging show love to the victims of earthquake-stricken area is now widespread.
sentences.chinese: 我听说为地震灾区的灾民献爱心的活动在广泛开展。

sentences.english: The purpose of this event is to raise funds for Typhoon Morakot victims.
sentences.chinese: 这次的活动是为了替莫拉克台风的灾民筹款。

sentences.english: Another survivor, a jeepney driver, lost his vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 另一名灾民，又损失了他工作用的吉普车。

sentences.english: We must co-ordinate our efforts to help the flood victims.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该同心协力以援助遭水灾的灾民。

sentences.english: B Indah has the highest number of flood victims.
sentences.chinese: 运达的水灾灾民的人数最多。

sentences.english: Lorca Mayor asked local supermarkets to provide food and drinking water to the victims.
sentences.chinese: 洛尔卡市市长要求当地超市向灾民提供食品和饮用水。

sentences.english: The government administered relief to famine victims.
sentences.chinese: 政府向灾民发放了救济品。

sentences.english: Farmer House, cold-formed steel structure frame system, Yangba Gansu.
sentences.chinese: 台湾援建甘肃阳坝镇灾民住房，薄壁型钢框架体系。

sentences.english: The Government acted quickly to relieve the widespread distress caused by the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 地震造成大范围的灾难，政府迅速采取行动赈济灾民。

sentences.english: The government provide alms to the victims.
sentences.chinese: 政府向灾民发放了救济品。

sentences.english: The Indonesian government said it had approved 26 million dollars in cash to help victims.
sentences.chinese: 印尼政府称它刚刚为灾民划拨了二千六百万美元现金。

sentences.english: We re collecting for victims of the earthquake-stricken area, please give generously.
sentences.chinese: 我们在为地震灾区的灾民募捐，请慷慨捐助。

sentences.english: You don't know how they suffered as disaster victims.
sentences.chinese: 你可不知道灾民的苦处。

sentences.english: The famine gripping Somalia is causing hundreds of thousands of desperate people to seek help wherever they can.
sentences.chinese: 索马里的饥荒使数十万索马里灾民四处逃荒求助。

definition: disaster-stricken/to be hit by a natural calamity
destitute and homeless (idiom); forced from one's home and wandering about/displaced
villager/(Tw) (Internet slang) person who likes to follow online discussions and add their opinions
